pages.text: Plectodiscus is hydrozoan known from the Devonian Hunsr√ºck Slate, Germany. It had a sail like structure on its circular body, and a large number of tentacles were growing on the bottom. It looked similar to the extant by-the-wind-sailor, and it is thought that it had a similar ecology.
